member.name: T:SeeingSharp.BuildTasks.ClickonceSignTask
member.summary: This task is responsible for automated signing of clickonce installation files. All steps of the following coding are besed on the workflow described here: http://blogs.msdn.com/b/vsto/archive/2009/04/29/signing-and-re-signing-manifests-in-clickonce.aspx

member.name: M:SeeingSharp.BuildTasks.ClickonceSignTask.Execute
member.summary: Führt beim Überschreiben in einer abgeleiteten Klasse die Aufgabe aus.

member.name: M:SeeingSharp.BuildTasks.ClickonceSignTask.TryParseVersion(System.String[])
member.summary: Tries to parse the version out of the given parts from a 'Application Files' subdirectory.

member.name: M:SeeingSharp.BuildTasks.ClickonceSignTask.TryRunProcess(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Tries to run the given process with the given parameters.

member.name: M:SeeingSharp.BuildTasks.ShaderBuildTask.Execute
member.returns: true, wenn die Aufgabe erfolgreich ausgeführt wurde, andernfalls false.

member.name: P:SeeingSharp.BuildTasks.ShaderBuildTask.ShaderProfile
member.summary: The shader profile to be used.

member.name: P:SeeingSharp.BuildTasks.ShaderBuildTask.OutputAdditionalExtension
member.summary: The name of the output without extension.
